name: HellCave
description:
Some villagers tell you their home is being terrorised by monsters from a cave nearby. You decide to take on an adventure to defeat the cave dwellers and save the village.

I recently started learning Unity and this is my first game. I would highly appreciate any feedback on how to improve it and what you guys think overall about it. 

If you encounter any bug throughout the game please do let me know so I can fix it as soon as possible ;)

NOTE: browser version does not support audio nor lighting, so I highly recommend downloading the game instead.
